markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grand Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4046) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 126</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Masquerade of Seasons Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4044)

**Requirements**
You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.

</column>

---

You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance. Stride up to your Speed; during this Stride, you can walk on air as if it were solid ground. You can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle. You must end your Stride on a surface that can support you or you fall.
name: Grand Dance
requirement: You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.
requirement_markdown: You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.

summary: You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance.
summary_markdown: You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Grand Dance Two Actions Source Impossible Lands pg. 126 Prerequisites Masquerade of Seasons Stance Requirements You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance. --- You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance. Stride up to your Speed; during this Stride, you can walk on air as if it were solid ground. You can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle. You must end your Stride on a surface that can support you or you fall.
